amendment.description: To establish a reserve fund to prevent catastrophic loss.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3078 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3078 proposed by Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S2243, S2250-2251; text: CR S2243) To establish a reserve fund to prevent catastrophic loss.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3078 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3078 proposed by Senator Vitter.
